scripts.app: concurrently "(docker compose up -d)" "(npm run start:dev --prefix server-text)" "(npm run start:dev --prefix server-app)" "(npm run start:dev --prefix server-api)" "(npm run start:dev --prefix server-auth)" "(npm run dev --prefix client-user)"
scripts.npmi: concurrently "(npm i)" "(npm i --prefix client-user)" "(npm i --prefix server-text)" "(npm i --prefix server-app)" "(npm i --prefix server-api)" "(npm i --prefix server-auth)"
